this_title: Memo from Machiavelli: How to Succeed in British Politics
introduction: Niccolo Machiavelli's name is synonymous with political intrigue, he was a political pragmatist, and his best-known book "The Prince" is as relevant today as it was in 16th-century Italy. Ian Richardson reads extracts.
chinese_title: Memo from Machiavelli: How to Succeed in British Politics
